articles.title: Latin America Vegetation Science Bibliometrics
articles.description: Analysing the relationships of Latin America and the Caribbean scientists in vegetation science literature
articles.contents:
In this webpage, we will put information about:
meetings (notes and recordings)
methodology
participants
results obtained
General information.
The Latin America and the Caribbean (LAC) section of the International
Association for Vegetation Science got funding for an assistantship to work
on a bibliometric analysis paper. The idea is to analyze the collaboration
networks based on co-authorships and citations extracted from vegetation
science journals (JVS, AVS, and VCS) to understand better the importance
and specificities of our region (LAC) within global collaborations. Here
is the proposed project. You may also look at the following conference
videos concerning this project :
bottin_redesCollabLAC.mp4 (In spanish) presentation for the XXIX Reunión Argentina de Ecología
139_CollaborationLatinAmerica.mp4 (In English) presentation for the 63rd Annual Symposium of the IAVS
